title: Google says Chrome 99 is the fastest web browser available on Mac
content:
Google released Chrome 99 at the start of the month, with the usual combination of performance improvements and new APIs for web developers. However, Google says the latest update is more of a performance boost than usual, and now apparently takes the crown as the fastest web browser on macOS. Google wrote in a blog

The post Google says Chrome 99 is the fastest web browser available on Mac appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google claims that Chrome 99 is now the fastest web browser available on macOS, thanks to engine improvements and updated graphics rendering.
